newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Israel July foreign currency reserves $17.968 bln.
newsitem.headline: Israel July foreign currency reserves $17.968 bln.

text.p: Israel's foreign currency reserves rose by $175 million at the end of July to $17.968 billion, the Bank of Israel said on Sunday.
The central bank attributed the rise to changes in the level of commercial bank deposits at the central bank as well as to government transfers.
